name: Core
description:
For 26 years, Core has been delivering technology consultancy to a range of industries. We are a Microsoft Gold Partner offering services around the entire Cloud platform. We work with our clients to solve business problems, reduce costs, increase efficiency, and achieve their organisation's objectives.
To deliver this we provide solutions and services including secure working on the move, optimising data and information, and providing infrastructure and software on a subscription and project basis.
